TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A white blood cell that has left the bloodstream and migrated into a tumor.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "tumor infiltrating lymphocyte"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "linfocito infiltrado en el tumor"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Glóbulo blanco que ha abandonado el torrente sanguíneo y ha migrado al tumor.
